product_name: Cannondale Utility Bike Helmet Accessory Kit
long_description: Accessorize your helmet to protect you against wet weather with the Cannondale Utility Bike Helmet Accessory Kit. It includes a reflective raincover, reflective ear covers and a flashing LED light. LED light offers multiple modes including flashing and steady, and it's mounted at the rear of the helmet. Fits most helmets.
short_description: Accessorize your helmet to protect you against wet weather with the Cannondale Utility Bike Helmet Accessory Kit. It includes a reflective raincover, reflective ear covers and a flashing LED light.
